Articles.Content:
I really hope this was your choice and that you have better things to move on to.

I will definitely miss you so good luck!
Goodbye, thank you, and good luck!

Why is the staff turnover at Squad so high? That's so weird.

Been bothering me alot as well.. Been like this since the beginning.

So I really hope this was his own choice and not him being fired like every other community manager we have had in the past.

It was really fun seeing him host squadcast especially back when Yargnit was co host as they had really great chemistry.

Farewell, Maxmaps! I have looked forward to tuning in for every Squadcast since I started playing. Your positive attitude and excitement about the game, about space exploration, and about reaching out to people to ignite their own passion for space (and launching little green men) has shone through on every episode. I'm sad to see you go, but wish you the best in the future!

oh! only just seen this, wow, unexpected!!

Look, can we stop changing CM's! It's starting to make me feel old!

Max, you've been awesome, thanks. Good luck with whatever your going on to!!

This came out of nowhere... Leaving on good terms..

Not your quote though...... So much is said in one line
Farewell Max! Thank you for all you have done.

Best of luck in your future endeavors, Max!

Now... when do we carve the turkey?

Wait, what?

Honestly, that saddens me. I´ve watched almost every squadcast and enjoyed that very much. Even - or especially - the facepalm moments.

Good to read you leave on good terms.

Leaves me to say:

I´ll miss you and wish you the best for your future endeavours.

I think I´ll open a beer on tonights squadcast, so

Cheers to you, good sir.

Edited December 1, 2015 by KerrMÃƒÂ¼

It's been a blast. Best of luck with what comes next Miguel! We'll miss 'ya...

Also hello Dr_Turkey! I can't wait for what the future holds.
Bye Max

Seven Hells! How did I overlook this thread for over two days?!

So you won the lottery or something??
We're gonna miss you...
Thank you Max! Godspeed!!!
Now that you ended your final stream, Max .... Be well and Fly safe.

<3

Best of luck in your future endeavors, Max!

Now... when do we carve the turkey?

Step awaaaaay from the knife.

I think IÃ‚Â´ll open a beer on tonights squadcast, so

Cheers to you, good sir.

You and me both buddy.

It's been a blast. Best of luck with what comes next Miguel! We'll miss 'ya...

Also hello Dr_Turkey! I can't wait for what the future holds.

Lot's of gobbling.
so long and thanks for all the... turkey (?)

Godspeed Maxmaps. Hope life treats you well as you move onward, and that you always think of this community fondly

Also, welcome aboard, Dr_Turkey!
Farewell Maxmaps! I hope your life heads into adventure and a wonderful lifetime, your service to the community will be forever remembered. A man of good is always remembered!
Maxmaps has reached escape velocity.

so long and thanks for all the... turkey (?)

Who want's fish anyway?

Godspeed Maxmaps. Hope life treats you well as you move onward, and that you always think of this community fondly

Also, welcome aboard, Dr_Turkey!

Much obliged!
It's sad to see you go, Max. Good luck with your future endeavors! (And welcome, Dr_Turkey!)

End of an era indeed.

Maxmaps, to many of us, you have been the public face of the dev team. Squadcast will never be the same again.

I look forward to seeing your name attached to some other project in the future, but for now, you will be missed.
Without Max, who will represent KSP? He is the voice and face of Squad
